word_mean: 羊膜穿刺术：经皮穿刺腹壁及子宫以抽取羊水的操作

sentence.Network_en: Amniocentesis is the removal of fluid from the amniotic sac.
sentence.Network_cn: 羊膜穿刺术是从羊膜囊抽取羊水的技术.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To investigate some questions about ultrasound localization of amniocentesis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨羊膜腔穿刺术超声定位的有关问题.

sentence.Network_en: Amniocentesis is the standard prenatal detection procedure for aneuploidy.
sentence.Network_cn: 羊膜穿刺术是出生前检测非整倍体的金标准.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 羊膜穿刺术(Amniocentesis)——一种产前诊断的方法，通常在妊娠4至6月抽取羊膜囊内婴儿四周的羊水进行。扩增(Amplification)—— …
...illi Sampling/CVS) 胎盘素或抽羊水 (amniocentesis) 方法来进行. 亲子鉴定可以在已逝世的人的由殡仪馆工人收集的样本上进行.
羊膜腔穿刺术(amniocentesis)可于妊娠中期17～20周通过腹壁进行，羊水细胞是胎儿脱落的上皮细胞，经培养后可做酶活性测定或基 …
做羊水穿刺(Amniocentesis)最好的时间在16-20周之间做,通常是年龄在35或35(一般35或35以上的孕妇在一百七十人里大概出产生一个 …

list.abs: an amniocentesis revealed normal karyotype ( 46 , XX ) .羊膜穿刺术显示核型正常，为46，XX。
during an amniocentesis a small amount ( usually 2 tablespoons ) of amniotic fluid that surrounds the fetus is removed .在羊膜穿刺术中，少量的包围胎儿的羊水（约两大汤匙)被抽取出来。

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from amnion + Greek kentēsis 'pricking' (from kentein 'to prick')

entry.tran: 羊膜穿刺术（抽取孕妇子宫羊水以检查胎儿健康状况）
entry.def: If a pregnant woman has an amniocentesis, fluid is removed from her womb in order to check that her unborn baby is not affected by certain genetic disorders.

means.word_mean: 1. (pregnancy) extraction by centesis of amniotic fluid from a pregnant woman (after the 15th week of pregnancy) to aid in the diagnosis of fetal abnormalities
